amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Weapons Procurement, Navy account by $19.6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part A of House Report 116-111 to increase funding for the Weapons Procurement, Navy account by $19.6 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallagher amendment (A108) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 236 (Roll no. 351).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallagher amendment (A108) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 236 (Roll no. 351).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A108) offered by Mr. Gallagher.
